sense.gloss: arrangement (of resources), deployment, stationing, posting, disposition, configuration, layout
to establish (an organization, a facility, a position, etc.), to set up
to appoint (someone to a certain position), to hire, to employ
to place (one's trust, one's faith, etc.), to bear (in mind, etc.)
to put down a tool (e.g. a pen) hence stopping what one is doing with that tool
to take in (boarders, etc.), to provide lodging in one's house
to leave something in a certain state, to keep something in a certain state
leaving as is, leaving alone, leaving to chance, neglecting, abandoning
placement, fixed position, mapping out, location

sdata.j: トランプを↑樫↑↓かし↓のテーブルに↑置↑↓お↓いて。
sdata.e: Place the deck of cards on the oaken table.

sdata.j: ↑代↑↓か↓わりにダイアルしていただけませんか？↑電話↑↓でんわ↓の↑位置↑↓いち↓が↑高↑↓たか↓すぎて。
sdata.e: Could you dial for me? The telephone is too high.

sdata.j: チップを↑置↑↓お↓きましたか。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑理論↑↓りろん↓の↑基礎↑↓きそ↓をどこに↑置↑↓お↓いているのか。
sdata.e: What do you base your theory on?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれを↑一定↑↓いってい↓の↑間隔↑↓かんかく↓を↑置↑↓お↓いて↑練習↑↓れんしゅう↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You must practice it at regular intervals.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑守備↑↓しゅび↓↑位置↑↓いち↓はどこですか。
↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑手紙↑↓てがみ↓を↑置↑↓お↓くまで↑待↑↓ま↓ちましょう。
sdata.e: I will wait till you have written the letter.

sdata.j: ↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓に↑高価↑↓こうか↓なカメラが↑置↑↓お↓き↑忘↑↓わす↓れられていた。
sdata.e: There was an expensive camera left in the classroom.

sdata.j: ↑机↑↓つくえ↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑本↑↓ほん↓が↑置↑↓お↓いてある。
sdata.e: A book is lying on the desk.

sdata.j: ↑鞄↑↓かばん↓を↑置↑↓お↓き↑忘↑↓わす↓れるなんて、↑君↑↓きみ↓も↑不注意↑↓ふちゅうい↓だったね。
sdata.e: It was careless of you to leave your bag.
